song_the_chain.track_name: How To Recognise a Work of Art

song_dave.track_name: How Can You Do It Alone

segue_the_chain: From Art of Noise to How to Recognise a Work of Art…

segue_dave.line: From art to dances, here's a track from The Who's album "Face Dances"
segue_dave.explanation: Art, is a synonim, in its more narrow sense, of the word dances.
